thread.title: Tammy Mrotek of RE/MAX Unlimited Northwest Appears in as a Agent for 2015
thread.title_full: Tammy Mrotek of RE/MAX Unlimited Northwest Appears in Chicago Magazine as a Five Star Real Estate Agent for 2015

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Tammy Mrotek of RE/MAX Unlimited Northwest Appears in as a Agent for 2015
text:
“This award truly means the world to me. When clients take the time to do something nice for me, that speaks volumes and is the greatest compliment in this industry. I strive hard to make sure every one of my clients I have the privilege to represent has value added due to my experience, education and commitment to their best interest,” says Tammy Mrotek of RE/MAX Unlimited Northwest. Tammy Mrotek, RE/MAX Unlimited Northwest magazine
 magazine 3 percent of agents in the Chicago area received this recognition.
“I became fascinated with homeownership at a very early age, around seven years old. Growing up in a poor, inner-city Chicago neighborhood, most everyone rented their places to live, including my very young mother. Having a backyard that was not just cement, but an actual lawn to play on was a big deal. If someone owned their home, they were considered well off. I would see real estate signs in front of homes and could not understand why my mother could not just go and buy a nice house for us to live in. The realities of economics took over as I became older, but my desire to help families achieve homeownership is instilled in my very soul. I truly love this profession!” says Tammy.
“The home buying and selling process can be very stressful. Five Star Professional works hard to identify those outstanding real estate agents that can make all of the difference. Five Star Real Estate Agents are experienced professionals that get top marks from their clients and get results,” Josh Kimball, VP Marketing, Five Star Professional
Tammy Mrotek’s Five Star award profile can be viewed here .
Five Star Professional has been conducting market research to define and promote professional excellence in service professionals since 2003. Its Five Star Real Estate Agent award program is the largest and most widely published real estate agent award program in North America.
Real estate agents are awarded based on an in depth research process. Thousands of consumers are contacted to rate their real estate agent on ten evaluative criteria including customer service, market knowledge, negotiation, closing preparation and overall satisfaction. Beyond a qualifying client evaluation score, real estate agents are evaluated
There is no fee to be considered or awarded. Visit http://www.fivestarprofessional.com for more information.
